TEXT.TITLE: IC INDUSTRIES<ICX> UP AFTER BEAR STEARNS REPORT
TEXT.BODY: IC Industries Inc rose 2-3/4 to 33-1/4 following a favorable comment by analyst Gary Schneider of Bear Stearns and Co, traders said. Schneider was not immediately available for comment. IC Industries also was the subject of a favorable report earlier in the week from First Boston Corp, traders said. Sources said Schneider's report concluded IC Industries shares are undervalued and will eventually trade in the mid-40's. Reuter
